item.title: Contact
item.description: Wil je meedoen, voor of achter de schermen? Lees de aankondiging op GeoForum of stuur mail naar tv at osgeo.nl. TODO: This is an example of a custom shortcode that you can put right into your content. You will need to add a form action to the the shortcode to make it work. Check out Formspree for a simple, free form service. Your Name Email Address An email address is required.
